data.title: Vintage Tage Danielsson Poster by Marcin Jan Mroszczak, 1974
data.meta_description: Tage Danielsson is an original poster realized by Marcin Jan Mroszczak (Katowice, 1950) in 1974. Good condition. Hand-signed and dated. Marcin Jan Mr…
data.text:
Description

Tage Danielsson is an original poster realized by Marcin Jan Mroszczak (Katowice, 1950) in 1974. Good condition. Hand-signed and dated. … more Tage Danielsson is an original poster realized by Marcin Jan Mroszczak (Katowice, 1950) in 1974. Good condition. Hand-signed and dated. Marcin Jan Mroszczak (born January 10, 1950 in Katowice ) - one of the founders and co-owner of the Corporate Profiles DDB group, creative director of the DDB Warszawa advertising agency , board member of several companies from the group; graphic artist, designer, author of theater and film posters, from 2011 to 2015 a social advisor to the President of the Republic of Poland. Son of professor Józef Mroszczak , graphic artist, one of the founders of the Polish school of posters. He studied at the Academy of Fine Arts in Warsaw , defended his diploma in the poster studio of professor Henryk Tomaszewski. This piece is attributed to the mentioned designer/maker. It has no attribution mark and no

official proof of authenticity,

however it is well documented in design history. I take full responsibility for any authenticity

issues arising from misattribution less
